Package game.characters

Class Player

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
city.cs.engine.Walker
game.characters.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.CollisionListener, city.cs.engine.StepListener, EventListener
public class Player extends city.cs.engine.Walker implements city.cs.engine.StepListener, city.cs.engine.CollisionListener
Represents the player character in the game. Handles movement, jumping, collision detection, and interactions with game objects. Tracks health, coins collected, and other player states.
